codeanticode.glgraphics
Class GLLightSetup

java.lang.Object
  codeanticode.glgraphics.GLLightSetup

public class GLLightSetup
extends java.lang.Object

This class encapsulates a light setup using the built-in light Model in OpenGL (1 ambient light + 8 point lights). By creating many instances of this GLLightSetup class, it is possible to switch between different light arrangements in the application by calling the enableSetup() method.
